author: Drago Prime
description: A Red Discord Bot cog that monitors Jellyfin users and notifies when they have been inactive for 30 and 60 days.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Jellyfin Monitor cog! Use `[p]help jellyfinmon` to get started.
name: JellyfinMonitor
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data.
